translation.text: Bankstown Line, Blue Mountains Line, Inner West & Leppington Line, North Shore Line, Western Line - Delays

Flow-on delays continue to some services in both directions due to signal equipment repairs at Auburn. Train stopping patterns and departure platform may change at short notice. 

Gaps to services may be experienced. Please allow extra travel time, listen for announcements and check information screens before boarding trains.

Delays continue to some services due to a freight train with mechanical problems between Hawkesbury River and Cowan earlier. Please allow up to 45 minutes additional travel time on some services. Crews are working to rectify the issue. Please listen to announcements and check information screens before boarding your service.

Canley Vale, Fairfield, Yennora, Guildford, Merrylands, Granville, Clyde, Auburn This service is diverting via Regents Park due to signal equipment repairs at Auburn.

From Cabramatta this service will be first stop Lidcombe via Regents Park then as timetabled. 

Allow plenty additional travel time, listen to announcements and check station information screens for service changes.

The lift between the concourse and platforms 3, 5 and 6 is temporarily out of service.
If you require assistance, please call staff at Town Hall Station on 9379 4110.

The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. Customers travelling from the city who require lift access should alight at International Airport station and catch a service from platform 1 back to Domestic Airport station. You can also call 8337 8450 for assistance.
The lift between the concourse and street The Kingsway is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9848 9151.
The lift between the concourse and Joyce Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9851 7203.
The escalator between the concourse and the bus interchange is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4023.
The lift between the concourse and platform 1 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 9563 7520.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. For assistance, please see staff or call 9522 1281.
The lift between the concourse and platform 2 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5616.

From 8 April until 30 June some stairs between the station and the street level will close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff  or call 93794110.
Please take extra care on the platform during platform renewal works and stand behind the yellow line on the platform prior to boarding your train.

Driveway repair works at Bondi Junction Interchange
From Tuesday 6 April to Monday 19 April 2021 construction work is taking place at the driveway into the bus interchange at Grosvenor Street and Newland Street.
The western side of Grosvenor Street, between Oxford Street and Grafton Street, will be closed to pedestrians. There will be no access from the bus interchange directly onto Grosvenor Street during this time.
For access into the station, please use the Meriton entrance via the Oxford Street Mall or the entrances via Grafton Street.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
All train services will arrive and depart from Platform 1, until 3:30pm, due to track equipment repairs.

From Monday 5 April to Monday 19 April 2021 stair refurbishment work is taking place at the Terminus street station entry to Petersham Station.

For access into the station, please use the underpass to the Trafalgar street station entrance. If you need further assistance contact station staff on 9752 8426.
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
